body: Also the only thing NTR in this story is the fact Stepmom is married to Dad! It's clear their marriage was one of "convivence!" (she no longer carries the "stigma of being a Christmas cake" hitting her 30's) and she's "free babysitting for his son!) As someone noted, what job did she do that's attached to her university! Likely hood is she was a career woman till society pressure finally broke her and she went looking for a husband to have a child with! Dad was her latest catch, though J.R. became a better primary choice! (Especially since Dad was gone for so long! She figured by the time they "ran away and eloped" they'd have a place already with a kid or two! Serious note, what is that guy's actual Job that keeps him away for that long!) Something tells me Dad dodged a bullet (other then losing his son) as I have to wonder, if dad had sex with her. Would she have gotten creepy attached to him like she did with his son? Very Eerie

Too add to the Praying Mantis bit! Males "die young", just like the young idiot LOL. Got to wonder if in her insane mind, she believes his father will still keep her for the "sake of the child" (If this wasn't Modern Day, I'd say they could hide his son's remains, that in the scenario he doesn't try and kill her for what she did to his son....which is his fault as he knew how the boy was after what was described with "the last stepmom"). Even though he can do what he's done already! Have her ass arrested for the murder of his son, receive custody of the baby as his grandson.....and then remarry again and hope this one isn't nuts! Should be easier since it's a baby and not a raping teenager! Feel bad for his blond classmate, ain't that going to be a surprise that them going their separate ways at her apartment was "the last time they'd ever see each other!" But seriously, Dad was gone for a YEAR I'm guessing since she didn't look pregnant in the final scene! What Job does he do again?
